column5: Look forward to the replies. Thanks
Princess Auto has a 3 1/2 and I'm sure I saw a 6" somewhere.
Must be special order or something because they only had a mount with no drop at all when i was there today. Ill check their website. Thanks
A trailer and hitch place will generally have a much wider range of choices available than an store that sells them as a side line.
Go to a welding shop and they will make whatever you want. We have made lots of em.

Reese shows an 11" in their normal Class IV's..  http://www.reeseprod.com/  ..sorry.. missed the Class II x 1 1/4"... 4 3/4 " looks like their max.  Like Dara said though.. easy to fabricate what ever you need to get the correct ride height.
